title: Planning to purchase a Windows 10 computer? Microsoft will buy your old device
text:
Planning to purchase a Windows 10 computer? Microsoft will buy your old device 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Want to purchase a new Windows 10 machine? Want to get rid off your existing old gear? Microsoft has an offer you wouldn't want to refuse. R... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
